shortcv.p: Giorgos Lamprogiotas holds a B.Sc. in Management of Information Systems from the Department of Management Science and Technology (DMST), Athens University of Economic and Business (AUEB).He work as a Research Assistant in ISTLab/OIS from 2004 and he has participated in, among others, the eClassify project (Ministry of Development / Secretariat for Research and Technology)

His interests lay in the field of Systems Analysis and Business Process Modelling. He is co-authiring in Dr. Poulymenakou A. "Analysis and Modeling of Business Systems and Processes" (to be published).
